summary_analyst: CVE-2025-24893 affects Xwiki by allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted input that is improperly handled in the file upload functionality.
summary_ciso: CVE-2025-24893 poses an immediate risk to Xwiki users, as it can potentially expose sensitive data through an unpatched vulnerability, necessitating urgent mitigation to prevent data breaches and protect business continuity.
description: CVE-2025-24893 affects Xwiki by allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted input that is improperly handled in the file upload functionality.

news_article.title: RondoDox Exploits Unpatched XWiki Servers to Pull More Devices Into Its Botnet

summary_analyst: CVE-2025-64446 affects the Fortinet Fortiweb web application firewall, allowing a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via crafted requests due to improper validation of input parameters.
summary_ciso: CVE-2025-64446 exposes Fortinet FortiWeb to critical vulnerabilities that could lead to substantial business disruptions and data breaches, necessitating immediate mitigation to protect sensitive information and maintain operational integrity.
description: CVE-2025-64446 affects the Fortinet Fortiweb web application firewall, allowing a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via crafted requests due to improper validation of input parameters.

summary_analyst: CVE-2025-9242 affects WatchGuard Fireware, allowing remote attackers to exploit a vulnerability in the web management interface to execute arbitrary code via crafted HTTP requests.

summary_analyst: CVE-2025-61757 is a vulnerability in Oracle Identity Manager that allows an unauthenticated attacker to exploit a flaw in the web interface, potentially leading to unauthorized access and manipulation of user accounts.
